node.title: Release Faster, With Confidence
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

Release Faster, with Confidence

Your app works in the lab. But is it truly ready for your customers? Only Applause can tell. We deliver authentic, real-world feedback on the quality of your digital experiences. Through an enterprise-grade testing platform and our global uTest community of independent digital experts, with testing teams matched to your precise needs. Delivering aggregated results with the speed, scale and flexibility you expect. So you'll know for sure the quality is there. And you can release with confidence.

Enterprise-Class Digital Quality Feedback

Integrates Seamlessly into Your Workflow, with No Overhead

Today, Applause is the only partner that can provide brands like you with authentic, real-world insight on how your digital assets perform. Our disruptive approach to digital quality harnesses the power of our enterprise-grade testing platform and leverages the uTest Community of more than one million digital experts worldwide. Dovetailing seamlessly with your existing systems and processes, and introducing no overhead. Automatically delivering aggregated, immediately actionable feedback, in the language of your customers.

Digital Innovators Turn to Us

Digital-first brands like Google and Uber turn to Applause to help them deliver the highest quality digital assets and experiences. Your customers, along with the billions of digital consumers around the world, use multiple apps and products tested by us, every single day.

See How We Help Your Industry

The Value of Applause Is Clear

Only Applause executes with the speed, scale and flexibility you require and expect – rapidly standing up detailed testing programs that deliver authentic, impactful, actionable results. That’s why we’re a testing best practice for digital innovators across the globe, and an integral part of modern SDLCs in every industry.

For the Business
30%acceleration in planned revenue
200%increase in testing capacity
Development & QA Teams
10%increase in conversion rate
50%reduction in critical fixes needed
150%increase in number of releases per year
10%increase in customer retention rate
200%increase in testing capacity
30%acceleration in planned revenue
10%increase in conversation rate
50%reduction in critical fixes needed
10%increase in customer retention rate
Dev & QA Teams
150%increase in number of releases per year
200%increase in testing capacity
30%acceleration in planned revenue
50%reduction in critical fixes needed
150%increase in number of releases per year
10%increase in customer retention rate
10%increase in conversion rate
Learn How We Help Brands Like Yours

Discussing the State of Digital Quality in 2023

This year’s State of Digital Quality report provides a snapshot of the most common flaws, coverage, and testing challenges and introduces a series of frameworks gleaned from Applause’s years of experience working with global technology leaders and innovators. Join our panel to learn what sets these organizations apart when it comes to creating excellence in digital experiences.
Watch Now

uTest – The World’s Largest Community of Independent Digital Experts

Available On-Demand and Across the Globe, When You Need Them

We leverage the world’s largest, most diverse community of independent digital experts to form highly skilled, specialized testing teams for fast, authentic results. Spanning 200 countries and territories, and every device/OS combination imaginable, testers deliver aggregated, authentic feedback and insights into how your products and digital assets work in real-world conditions.

Learn More About Our Community﻿

node.title: About Applause
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]
About Applause

Release Faster, With Confidence

We help brands do it every day. How? By testing with real people in the real world. As crowdtesting pioneers, we connect the world’s greatest enterprises with the world’s largest testing community. So brands can build better, release with confidence and deliver digital experiences customers love.

Watch Our Overview

A Release Partner With an Unparalleled Approach to Digital Quality

It's a bold statement that we proudly own

Why are we so different? Our enterprise-grade platform, our global uTest community, our shared values. Applause’s disruptive approach to testing and quality creates unparalleled scale and flexibility for our customers. How? First, we’ve built the world’s largest testing community. Over 1.7M digital experts that can match any testing demographic, configuration or experience required. This global community works hand-in-hand with the Applause team, delivering meaningful, actionable business insight to our customers daily. Unlike traditional testing companies and models (including lab-based and offshoring), we help development teams build and release better software with speed, scale and flexibility.

Supported by the broad resources of Vista Equity Partners, our vision is to be the release partner for all aspects of digital quality.

Born Out of Disruption

It’s in our DNA. From being the first crowdtesting company to putting the Metaverse through its paces, our past informs our future. Wherever digital experiences go, we’ll be there for our customers. See what we’re made of:

2007
  • Doron Reuveni co-founds company
  • Raises 2.3 MM A Round
2008
  • GA launch of uTest – first global testing community
  • Raises 5.2 MM B Round
2009
  • Gartner names uTest ‘cool vendor’
2010
  • Proliferation of mobile & digital apps fuels company’s growth
  • Raises 13 MM C Round
2011
  • Continues to scale & expand testing services
  • Raises 17 MM D Round
2012
  • Acquires Apphance, establishes Poland engineering presence
  • Ranks as Inc. Magazine’s 16th fastest growing company
2013
  • Signs first strategic partner
  • Moves into new headquarters in Greater Boston
2014
  • Acquires Testhub, establishes EU HQ in Berlin
  • Renames company Applause
  • Raises $43M E Round
2015
  • Hits 1st $20M+ booking quarter
  • Lands 1st four seven-figure deals
2016
  • Launches Automation, Payments & Omnichannel offerings
  • uTest community exceeds 250K testers
  • Raises $35M F Round
2017
  • Hits $100M in bookings
  • Acquired by Vista Equity Partners
  • Launches Customer Journey & Digital Experience offerings
2018
  • Hits $100M+ in revenue
  • Expands platform to include web & mobile automation framework
  • Launches AI & Voice offering
2019
  • Launches AI Training & Testing offering
  • Establishes Applause Labs R&D center
2020
  • Launches Integrated Functional Testing offering – combining value of automated + manual functional testing
2021
  • Delivers $150M+ in revenue
  • Launches In-Sprint Testing, Open APIs & other features
  • Launches Metaverse & Crypto testing
  • Doron Reuveni becomes Board Chairman – Chris Malone promoted to CEO
2022
  • Chris Malone takes Vista CEO environmental pledge
  • Releases Test Case Management solution to customers

Real Solutions for Every Digital Quality Challenge

From manual testing to automation, AI and voice to usability and customer experience, we’ve got it covered. Our years of know-how span the SDLC, all industries and all use cases.

View Our Solutions

We’re Relentlessly Authentic

We work hard and we play hard. We’re a smart, diverse, fun group, with a maniacal focus on customer success. Each day, we celebrate authenticity, as individuals and as a global team.

Explore Our Culture

Choose Your Own Office Adventure

Whether you thrive in a high-energy, snack-fueled environment with other bright thinkers or prefer the quiet of your home office, we have a place for you.

Boston (Global HQ)

View Jobs

Berlin (EU HQ)

View Jobs

Herzliya, Israel

View Jobs

Warsaw, Poland

View Jobs

Hyderbad, India

View Jobs

Remote, Global

View Jobs

Don't take our word for it

Applause is regularly recognized for its business acumen, innovative solutions, and industry-specific expertise. Take a glance at what people are saying about us.

Company of the Year Computer Software
2022
Best in Show Software Development
2022
Overall SaaS - Development + DevOps Category
2022
Most Innovative Enterprise Product
2021

Today, brands win or lose based on their digital experiences – apps need to work the first-time and everytime. Applause is proud to sit at the center of the SDLC – and to be the release partner for enterprises seeking to launch applications and products that continuously delight their end-users.

Chris Malone
Chief Executive Officer

When You Win, We Win

Learn how we help brands build better, release faster, and create the digital experiences that delight their customers and drive loyalty.

Improving confidence in fund transfers globally
Western Union banks on Applause for payment verification and QA for domestic and international transfers.
Read Now
Increasing test capacity and customer satisfaction
Applause helps Intermarché boost their e-commerce platform conversions via robust functional and payment testing.
Read Now
Bolstering the UX and enabling successful digital products
Applause augments internal QA to test digital properties with a wide range of users and mix of device configurations.
Read Now

node.title: An Enterprise-Grade Testing Platform for Digital…
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

An Enterprise-Grade Testing Platform

The Applause platform was built from the start for speed, scale and flexibility.

Designed With Agile in Mind

Built to align with the rapid cadence of CI/CD, and to interoperate with all standard software.

We enable the testing and digital quality process with the Applause platform, which was built from the start for speed, scale, security and enterprise-class performance. Our platform is open, interoperable and integrates with all standard development tools, environments and systems – including APIs, bug tracking and bug fix verification systems. The Applause platform was designed to align with the rapid cadence of CI/CD, and to dovetail seamlessly into your existing pipeline and workflow. And our Applause Quality Score (AQS) helps you track and improve quality over time, by evaluating your release readiness build over build.

Our platform also drives the Community processes of tester engagement and payments, and is the foundation on which we deliver a slew of products and features that brands can deploy as their needs fit. From full stack automation testing, to test case management, to supporting specialized testing teams, the Applause platform delivers the level of enterprise scale and flexibility brands depend on.

An Extension of Your Team

Integrates seamlessly into existing systems, with no overhead.

Applause becomes a dynamic extension of your development team, integrating seamlessly into existing systems and processes, without adding complexity or overhead. We become intimately familiar with your existing workflow – developing deep, detailed knowledge of roadmaps, release cadences, sprints and apps, as well as the critically important factors that impact the success of your apps and other digital assets.

We actively improve your release velocity – bringing to bear our years of experience in solving the most challenging testing and digital quality problems – and can show you what is possible in improving your apps’ chances for success right out of the gate. We extend your development team’s resources – providing you with the actionable insight to build better software, and to release quicker and with more confidence.

Expertise at Every Step of Your SDLC

Applause helps guide your testing process – from test set-up to measuring and reporting on outcomes – to speed up your testing and improve the quality of your digital assets.

Automotive & Powersports

Whether it's testing online car configurators or infotainment integrations in production vehicles, we help 7 of the 10 most valuable auto companies in the world deliver more effective in-car and online experiences. Check out our automotive-focused resources below and learn how we do it.

Featured

Featured Webinar

Testing Generative AI Applications

Join Applause & Voicebot.ai to discuss the risks, challenges, and testing strategies for safely deploying generative AI applications.

Watch Now
Featured Report

State of Digital Quality 2023 in Europe

See the most common digital issues across Europe and explore how different organizations compare when it comes to testing and device coverage.

Read Now

Recently Added

Case Study

Tech Company’s LLM Chat App

See how a tech company worked to reduce bias and improve the user experience for its generative AI application before launching in multiple countries.

Read Now
Webinar

The Future of Sustainable Mobility with SEAT:CODE

Learn how SEAT:CODE is driving the future of sustainable mobility through innovative projects that enable governments and companies to provide people with greener travel options.

Watch now
Webinar

​Onboarding A Crowdtesting Partner

Learn how to get started with crowdtesting. We'll guide you through choosing a pilot project, setting goals and scope, meaduring success, and getting the most value out of the engagement.

Watch now
Webinar

Sam's Club Discusses Its Inclusive Design Journey

Sam's Club is creating a world-class inclusivity program with experiences for everyone through organizational change and involving persons with disabilities.

Watch now

Most Popular

Report

State of Digital Quality 2023

A comprehensive report outlining the most common issues uncovered during testing – and ways to prevent those defects from reaching customers. Guidance on how to improve digital quality.

Read Now
Webinar

Discussing the State of Digital Quality in 2023

This webinar offers context around some of the findings in this year's State of Digital Quality Reports, plus guidance on how to improve digital quality capabilites and processes.

Watch now
Ebook

6 Steps to Get Started With Crowdtesting

Set your crowdtesting efforts up for success with these six steps. Learn how to select a project, develop success criteria, and lay the foundation for an effective partnership.

Read Now
Ebook

How SAFe Organisations Can Achieve Built-in Quality

This eBook explains why built-in quality is so important in scaled Agile, assesses challenge areas and provides recommendations for how to tailor quality within SAFe to your organisation.

Read Now

Resource Not Found

We're sorry it looks like the resources your looking for no longer exists. You're sure to find other great material if you browse our other resources.

The Blueprint For The Connected Home

Provides clear images and motion detection. Gives few false positives; accurately distinguishes between people and background motion, such as swaying branches or passing vehicles.

Lock
Open and lock home as needed for family, friends, deliveries. Monitor activity around the home perimeter.

Hub
Seamlessly connects to other smart home devices. Provides relevant responses to voice commands from multiple members of the household.

Lights
Can be turned on/off/dimmed remotely, or by custom scheduling.

Thermostat
Allows users to easily schedule programs for different zones and adjust remotely via app.

TV
Works with a variety of streaming services and other devices. Lets users easily switch programs between devices.

Vacuum
Effectively cleans different surface types and maneuvers around obstacles. Allows users to monitor/schedule cleaning via an app.

Connected Devices

We help our IoT clients ensure their software, hardware, and firmware work in harmony across every real-world setting - reducing customer complaints and product returns. Check out our connected device-focused resources below and learn how we do it.

Featured

Featured Webinar

Testing Generative AI Applications

Join Applause & Voicebot.ai to discuss the risks, challenges, and testing strategies for safely deploying generative AI applications.

Watch Now
Featured Report

State of Digital Quality 2023 in Europe

See the most common digital issues across Europe and explore how different organizations compare when it comes to testing and device coverage.

Read Now

Recently Added

Case Study

Tech Company’s LLM Chat App

See how a tech company worked to reduce bias and improve the user experience for its generative AI application before launching in multiple countries.

Read Now
Case Study

Audi case study

Learn how Applause helps Audi to create a SAFe implementation strategy and grow its built-in quality practice within the myAudi solution.

Read Now
Webinar

​Onboarding A Crowdtesting Partner

Learn how to get started with crowdtesting. We'll guide you through choosing a pilot project, setting goals and scope, meaduring success, and getting the most value out of the engagement.

Watch now
Webinar

Sam's Club Discusses Its Inclusive Design Journey

Sam's Club is creating a world-class inclusivity program with experiences for everyone through organizational change and involving persons with disabilities.

Watch now

Most Popular

Report

State of Digital Quality 2023

A comprehensive report outlining the most common issues uncovered during testing – and ways to prevent those defects from reaching customers. Guidance on how to improve digital quality.

Read Now
Webinar

Discussing the State of Digital Quality in 2023

This webinar offers context around some of the findings in this year's State of Digital Quality Reports, plus guidance on how to improve digital quality capabilites and processes.

Watch now
Ebook

6 Steps to Get Started With Crowdtesting

Set your crowdtesting efforts up for success with these six steps. Learn how to select a project, develop success criteria, and lay the foundation for an effective partnership.

Read Now
Ebook

How SAFe Organisations Can Achieve Built-in Quality

This eBook explains why built-in quality is so important in scaled Agile, assesses challenge areas and provides recommendations for how to tailor quality within SAFe to your organisation.

Read Now

We're sorry it looks like the resources your looking for no longer exists. You're sure to find other great material if you browse our other resources.

Contact Us

Learn More About Applause

Headquartered in Framingham, Massachusetts—Applause is comprised of employees located throughout the world. Our five core offices are located in the United States, Germany, Israel, Poland and India.

Click the button below to get contact information for each of our offices, see our list of job openings and to learn a little more about the team and life at Applause. Digital experiences matter.

Create a Winning Testing Strategy with Applause

node.title: Crowdtesting
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

Crowdtesting

Applause invented the crowdtesting category in 2007, and we have been the driving force in testing and digital quality innovation ever since. We've helped thousands of brands deliver quality digital assets and experiences to their customers on a global scale.

What Is Crowdtesting?

Deliver Quality Digital Assets & Experiences, With the Speed, Scale and Flexibility of Crowdtesting

Crowdtesting, or crowdsourced testing, is the fastest and most flexible way to ensure you release high-quality software quickly and with confidence. Crowdtesting leverages skilled testing teams sourced from a globally dispersed community of independent digital experts, who are highly skilled and ready to stand up testing at a moment’s notice, in any language, on any device and operating system.

These testers serve as proxies for your own customers – delivering detailed, aggregated and authentic real-world feedback on the quality, user experience and functionality of your digital assets. They live, work and play in the industries and real-world scenarios that you need to test in to ensure that you deliver delightful digital experiences to your end users, the first time and every time.

Why Crowdtesting?

Crowdtesting allows you to quickly scale to support new product launches or expansion into new geographic regions, without having to hire additional staff. See how crowdtesting can help your team improve quality and speed release velocity.

Faster Innovation with Fewer Bugs
Through rapid testing and feedback, QA teams can better keep up with an increasing pace of development, while improving quality – helping you get to market faster with higher-quality digital assets.
Improved Customer Experience
Authentic feedback from real users in real-world settings helps you improve app performance and deliver better customer experiences – increasing conversion rates and driving retention.
Reduced Testing Efforts & Cost
Remote, distributed teams help you scale test coverage without the burden of additional overhead costs.

Our Approach To Crowdtesting

Deliver Exceptional Digital Assets Quickly With the Scalability and Flexibility of Crowdtesting

We engage crowdsourced testing teams matched to your exact needs in terms of demographic, location, industry, language, device/OS combination and testing expertise. This allows you to replicate real-world scenarios and test with digital experts that match your target customers. Crowdsourced testers are skilled in the full suite of testing solutions – from manual exploratory testing to accessibility and payments testing. You’ll have a primary point of contact to manage your testing projects and a dedicated team working for you behind the scenes to deliver triaged test results directly into your bug tracking system, fitting easily into your existing workflows.

The distributed, remote and on-demand nature of crowdtesting gives you unparalleled scalability and time-to-results when compared to traditional testing methods. It also delivers unmatched and nearly limitless coverage across testing scenarios. Since testers are available on demand and around the globe, you can scale testing up or down to meet the needs of your internal teams and end users. That’s why Applause is a testing best practice for digital innovators, and an integral part of every modern SDLC.

Crowdtesting ROI

Only Applause executes with the speed, scale and flexibility you require and expect – rapidly standing up detailed testing programs that deliver authentic, impactful, actionable results. That’s why we’re a testing best practice for digital innovators across the globe, and an integral part of modern SDLCs in every industry.

For the Business
30%acceleration in planned revenue
200%increase in testing capacity
Development & QA Teams
10%increase in conversion rate
50%reduction in critical fixes needed
150%increase in number of releases per year
10%increase in customer retention rate
200%increase in testing capacity
30%acceleration in planned revenue
10%increase in conversation rate
50%reduction in critical fixes needed
10%increase in customer retention rate
Dev & QA Teams
150%increase in number of releases per year
200%increase in testing capacity
30%acceleration in planned revenue
50%reduction in critical fixes needed
150%increase in number of releases per year
10%increase in customer retention rate
10%increase in conversion rate

Our Testing Community

Applause handles all aspects of independent tester engagement and project management for ultimate peace of mind

We shoulder the end-to-end testing management process so you don’t have to. Our client-facing and community-facing teams work directly with you to support your needs – from the initial onboarding process and test cycle kickoffs, through to collecting and triaging the aggregated test results, analyzing them and validating that issues are fixed. Throughout the whole process, we work directly with you to speed up release velocity and improve product quality.

With Applause, you always know that you have the right testing team for your project. That’s because we take an AI/ML-driven approach to tester engagement. Our AI/ML capabilities identify the best testing team for your project based on your requirements and our testers’ personal profiles. This process ensures that your testers match your ideal target audience demographics – in terms of age, location, language, device/OS and more.

Get The Most From Crowdtesting
node._yoast_wpseo_metadesc: Crowdtesting, or crowdsourced testing, is the fastest and most flexible way to ensure you release high-quality software quickly and with confidence.

node.title: The Testing Partner for Digital-First Brands
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

Customer Stories

Applause has helped thousands of brands across all industries deliver digital assets and experiences that their customers love. We believe that your customers deserve the same, and we’re ready to help. Our domain expertise, global community, enterprise-class testing platform and specialized solutions provide the comprehensive approach you need to deliver the quality digital experiences your customers expect.

The World’s Most Recognized Brands Turn to Applause

From global ecommerce and B2B software to automotive and IoT, Applause supports the leading brands across every industry.

Real Customer Stories

Learn how brands leverage Applause to improve user satisfaction, get to market faster and deliver digital experiences their customers love.

By partnering with Applause, Dow Jones uncovers critical bugs across more than 750 device combinations and 70 countries.
Learn More
Applause tests both the driver and rider apps so Uber can move quickly and maintain a high standard of quality around the world and at scale.
Learn More
Applause verified Western Union’s payment transfers processed correctly across providers, operating systems and locations.
Learn More
As it transitioned into offering connected devices, Master Lock turned to Applause to help it deliver IoT experiences on a global scale.
Learn More
BT Group leverages Applause to gain efficiency, build user-centric digital products and drive ROI through test automation on a daily basis.
Learn More
Banner Health gained a deeper understanding of its patients’ challenges and digital preferences, and improved its accessibility by partnering with Applause.
Learn More
Applause’s real-world testers went through omnichannel customer journeys, going from in-app purchase to in-store pickup to ensure Shake Shack’s new app lived up to the brand’s high standards.
Learn More
Benefit Cosmetics ensures exceptional customer experiences that match the quality of its cosmetic items, across every market and in every language by leveraging Applause.
Learn More
For more customer case studies, video and webinars, visit our resource center.

Let Us Help You Deliver Quality Digital Assets & Experiences

Our community-based approach, coupled with our enterprise-class testing platform, has helped thousands of digital-first brands release higher-quality software faster, with confidence. Please fill out the form below to learn how we can help you do the same.

[/et_pb_code] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]

node.title: Applause Testing and Digital Quality Solutions
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

Our Solutions

Applause provides a wide range of digital quality solutions – from functional testing to specialized engagements.

Quality encompasses many things. Test for all of them.

Make sure every digital interaction works as intended, every time.

Applause helps brands like you capture and keep more customers, by focusing on digital interactions – your front door today and most important touchpoint – as the vast majority of customers will decide to stay or leave based on only one less-than-ideal digital experience. We can test and assess the quality of digital assets and experiences from the perspective and vantage point of your target customers – in every possible condition, including country, local language and device configuration, as well as through the lens of a slew of demographic and psychographic data points. No other company can provide such a rich trove of mission-critical insight and learning, to ensure that your digital assets are performing to expectations and your customers are having the intended digital experiences.

We enable the testing and digital quality process with the Applause Platform, which was built from the start with the speed, scale, security and enterprise-class performance and interoperability you expect. Our platform also drives the community processes of tester engagement and payments, and is the foundation on which we deliver a slew of solutions and features that you can deploy as needed. From functional to specialized testing solutions, from full stack automation testing to test case management features, it’s all there.

Functional Testing

Manual and Automated Testing for Complete Coverage

“Does this work for me?” That’s the first question your customers will ask, and rightly so. Even a perfect UI design means nothing if your users don’t have the digital experience they expect and you intend.

Launching a digital experience that works every time requires stringent testing to ensure that critical bugs do not reach your customers. That’s why Applause offers a full suite of functional testing services that not only reduce issues in your software, but also help you move faster to meet deadlines and release digital experiences on time and on target, with higher quality.

Our functional testing services include both manual structured – to ensure your customers can use the digital asset as intended – and exploratory testing – to find and fix critical errors when users behave in ways you can’t anticipate. And this is all done on real devices, in real locations and scenarios, by real users.

A balanced testing strategy is critical for every company – automation won’t work for every situation, including those with complex user flows. Likewise, manual testing can be too resource-intensive for simple regressions and less-complex use cases. That’s why we offer Integrated Functional Testing – a solution that no one else in the market delivers, which combines both manual and automated testing into one cohesive solution to ensure that your release decisions are faster, more accurate and made with greater confidence.

Applause Functional Testing Solutions

Manual Testing
Exploratory and structured testing to identify critical bugs in your digital properties
Learn More
Automated Testing
Combine top talent and proven methodologies with our automation framework built on open source technologies to move faster while avoiding traditional overhead
Learn More
Integrated Functional Testing
Scale up your test automation while maintaining coverage with manual testing – and access all results from both manual and automated testing in a single view
Learn More

Specialized Solutions

Ensure a Seamless Digital Experience Across All Customer Touchpoints and Interactions

Technology and digital assets are ingrained in all aspects of everyday life – from ordering food and hailing a ride, to checking bank statements and even visiting the doctor. Modern consumers are discerning; they know what a truly great digital experience looks like and expect assets to be enjoyable, accessible and easy to use as a result. This is true regardless of the platform the experience takes place on – it must be flawless, intuitive and relevant across Web, mobile, Voice app, payment type and in-car experience, as well as across all omnichannel customer journeys like BOPIS (Buy Online, Pickup in Store) and curbside pickup.

Like your customers, we know that true digital quality does not stop at functional testing. That’s why we offer a comprehensive suite of end-to-end specialized solutions for your entire software development lifecycle.

Our specialized solutions for User Experience, Accessibility, Customer Journeys, Voice, Payments, and AI Training and Testing ensure that your digital assets are intuitive, user friendly, inclusive and exceptional from start to finish so that you gain and retain customers and maintain a positive brand image.

Applause Specialized Testing Solutions

Accessibility
Expert-led accessibility assessments and community-driven testing and inclusive design studies so you can launch excellent digital experiences for all users
Learn More
Payments
Research and validate payment processes across the globe with in-market testers making real transactions
Learn More
User Experience
Expert-led user experience tests and studies that result in actionable recommendations to improve the usability of your digital asset
Learn More
Customer Journey
Mobilize in-market testers who match your target customer profiles to replicate end-to-end journeys in real-world conditions
Learn More
Voice
Comprehensive testing and feedback with native speakers in real-world environments to improve your conversational interfaces and voice assistants
Learn More
AI Training & Testing
Source AI training data at scale and test with real people across a wide variety of demographics and locations to ensure accurate and unbiased results
Learn More

Platform Features

Features of the Applause Platform for Even More Specialized Testing

With the pace of change moving faster than ever, the quality of digital experiences and the speed at which they can be delivered is paramount. The sooner you release, the faster you flank your competitors and keep your customers happy. Specialized features of the Applause Platform can help you launch these high-quality experiences with even greater velocity and confidence.

Our Bring Your Own Testers (BYOT) feature lets you manage your own internal testing resources – friends, family, end users, etc. – all within the Applause testing platform.

We will also soon be launching a new feature for test case management, so you can manage and execute test cases entirely through Applause's proven testing platform.

Applause Testing Platform Features

Bring Your Own Testers
Leverage the Applause testing platform and well-honed processes to manage internal testing resources
Learn More
Test Case Management
Coming soon, Applause’s test case management will enable you to manage and execute test cases entirely through in our testing platform
Learn More

Release Faster, with Confidence

Applause’s enterprise-class platform and full suite of functional and specialized testing solutions help you release with speed, scale and flexibility. Learn more about working with Applause.

Learn More about Working with Applause
[/et_pb_code] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]

node.title: Diversity, Equity & Inclusion
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]
Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

Diversity Is In Our DNA

We Embrace and Respect Authenticity

Diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI). At Applause, we understand their combined power. We value diversity in all its forms: age, color, disability, ethnicity, family/marital status, gender identity/expression, language, national origin, physical/mental ability, race, religion, sexual orientation, socio-economic status, veteran status and more.

Each day, we strive to both remove the hurdles to equity and to enable opportunities for all employees. As a minority owned business, DEI is in our DNA, and our global community adds tremendously to that mix. We also prioritize charitable contributions to organizations that support underrepresented groups, such as dream.org, GLAAD and United Way.

It’s really gratifying to see women being put in leadership roles, to see people who don’t look like me or who have different backgrounds be able to advance within the organization is really compelling.

Jenn Waltner
Global Content Marketing Manager

Applause is very inclusive and respectful of global culture. They give us freedom, respect Indian festivities and support celebrating our festivals. Diwali is the most interesting time for India employees as we receive nice gifts from Applause.

Samyuktha Banda
Head of Delivery Operations

Each team at Applause encourages cross-collaboration and inclusivity of others - we encourage speaking up about the issues that you may face, and everyone is always available and ready to lend a hand.

Tom Lee
Senior Financial Analyst

When I interviewed, I definitely saw things that I relate to. They were flexible, they were super open, the team was very multicultural. I was coming from Colombia and was really looking for a place where I could feel like I fit in and that had an open culture.

Maria Castañeda Buendia
Director of Business Development

Our uTest community offers outstanding diversification. Coming from different cultural, social and economic backgrounds they represent distinct mindsets and approaches – which is an unmatched asset for our global customers.

Michal Baczynski
Senior Director of Engineering

DEI in All We Do

It’s an intrinsic part of our culture and extends across everything we do.

Our Employees
We actively seek out the best talent and work with programs to hire within underrepresented communities. Internally, we offer workshops such as personality trait awareness, unconscious bias awareness and affinity groups, which enable employees to create their own experience around diversity topics and more.
Our Customers
We ensure a global, diverse perspective by engaging real users to test for our clients in all industries all around the world. Our mission — focused and massive — is to improve the digital experience for our clients and their customers, ensuring inclusive access for all. We believe that digital quality improves quality of life.
Our Global Testing Community
We are proud of uTest, the world’s largest community of digital experts — currently 1.7M members strong. This incredible group doubles as an economic framework, enabling work that may not exist otherwise. For example, in countries with limited opportunities for women in STEM jobs.

Insights Into Applause Nation

Like digital quality and serving our customers, DEI is an ongoing commitment. A never-ending process that requires a multi-faceted approach to talent acquisition.

36

nationalities across our global team

28

languages spoken by our global team

36%

are from under-represented groups

Gender
Age
Race/Ethnicity

Investing in Equity Every Day

Equity doesn’t just happen overnight, nor is it a one-time event. Our ongoing commitment is built on the foundation of our professional development curriculum and approach to leadership training. We provide all the tools needed — everything from unconscious bias training to methods for offsetting legacy disadvantages and more. It’s also core to the way we interact as teammates on a daily basis, and the expectations we set for each other.

A Contract for a Sustainable Future

Applause’s sustainability practices reflect our core belief that doing the right thing is also good for our customers and the world.

Our CEO, Chris Malone, signed the Vista CEO pledge, which commits us to measure greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions annually and reduce them by 50% by 2030 and reach net zero by 2050. Each year, we set GHG reduction targets and offset goals. We also focus on energy and waste management as well as product innovation to support positive environmental outcomes.

In addition, because we have built a successful hybrid office-remote work environment, we reduce energy use around the world.

Check Out Life at Applause

It’s one thing to talk about diversity and it’s another to see it in action. Our employees embody it in every way, and they regularly express their individuality via our Slack channels, in company meetings and through their work with customers.

Explore Our Culture
[/et_pb_code] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]
node._yoast_wpseo_metadesc: Learn how we invest in diversity, equity and inclusion, and how they are woven into the fabric of everything we do at Applause.

node.title: Testing for Health & Fitness Companies
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

Health & Fitness

When it comes to tracking fitness data or providing healthcare services, industry leaders turn to Applause to ensure their experiences are accurate, secure, and easy to use. Check out our resources below and learn how we do it.

Featured

Featured Webinar

Testing Generative AI Applications

Join Applause & Voicebot.ai to discuss the risks, challenges, and testing strategies for safely deploying generative AI applications.

Watch Now
Featured Report

State of Digital Quality 2023 in Europe

See the most common digital issues across Europe and explore how different organizations compare when it comes to testing and device coverage.

Read Now

Recently Added

Report

State of Digital Quality 2023 in Health and Wellness

This industry-specific report digs into digital quality trends based on real data from health and wellness companies. Learn tips to help your brand succeed.

Read Now
Case Study

Tech Company’s LLM Chat App

See how a tech company worked to reduce bias and improve the user experience for its generative AI application before launching in multiple countries.

Read Now
Ebook

How SAFe Organisations Can Achieve Built-in Quality

This eBook explains why built-in quality is so important in scaled Agile, assesses challenge areas and provides recommendations for how to tailor quality within SAFe to your organisation.

Read Now
Webinar

​Onboarding A Crowdtesting Partner

Learn how to get started with crowdtesting. We'll guide you through choosing a pilot project, setting goals and scope, meaduring success, and getting the most value out of the engagement.

Watch now

Most Popular

Report

State of Digital Quality 2023

A comprehensive report outlining the most common issues uncovered during testing – and ways to prevent those defects from reaching customers. Guidance on how to improve digital quality.

Read Now
Webinar

Discussing the State of Digital Quality in 2023

This webinar offers context around some of the findings in this year's State of Digital Quality Reports, plus guidance on how to improve digital quality capabilites and processes.

Watch now
Ebook

6 Steps to Get Started With Crowdtesting

Set your crowdtesting efforts up for success with these six steps. Learn how to select a project, develop success criteria, and lay the foundation for an effective partnership.

Read Now
Case Study

International Fitness Company

Read how a leading international fitness company leveraged Applause to set up a data-sourcing program and recruit, vet, train and manage over 2,500 participants to provide workout videos.

Read Now

Resource Not Found

We're sorry it looks like the resources your looking for no longer exists. You're sure to find other great material if you browse our other resources.

[/et_pb_code] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]
node._yoast_wpseo_metadesc: Applause helps leading healthcare and fitness companies deliver high quality apps that are accurate, secure and intuitive.

node.title: Industries
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

Industry Expertise

We’ve gained deep expertise in a variety of industries. Our knowledge and experience allow our test teams to quickly validate your most critical workflows and ensure key features work seamlessly.

Retail

Get closer to your shoppers and gain visibility into your end-to-end customer experiences with testers who match your buyer’s demographics. Get feedback from real customers in real-world environments throughout their shopping experiences, both online and in-store, including BOPIS, BNPL, BORIS and beyond.

Learn More

Media and Entertainment

Whether you’re looking to launch a new platform, validate content, expand to a new market, or gain insight into how an OTT device performs in real-world conditions, we can help you capture critical insight to improve the overall user experience.

Learn More

Financial

Trust is key for financial brands. Make sure your digital experiences inspire customer confidence, from onboarding and account opening to relevant, personalized offers. Test the complete customer journey across digital and physical touchpoints.

Learn More

Travel and Hospitality

Do your customers feel right at home with your digital experiences, or is there room for improvement? Get insight from real in-market users, on real devices, in real-world scenarios to make sure your customer journeys flow seamlessly.

Learn More

Healthcare

Consumers have high expectations for mHealth and telehealth experiences, as well as connected devices and wellness apps. Build custom testing teams that match your user profiles to assess your digital experiences across the devices and scenarios that matter most.

Learn More

Sports Betting and Gaming

With our in-market testing teams that match your customer profiles, you can be confident your digital experiences will win every time. Raise the stakes for your bettors with consistently great online gambling and sportsbook experiences, and reduce risk by validating geolocation technology.

Learn More

Telecommunications

Ensure seamless connectivity for every subscriber, every time with in-market test teams using real devices in real-world scenarios. We help MNOs confidently expand 5G coverage, validate international roaming experiences and ensure seamless IoT connectivity.

Learn More
[/et_pb_code] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]
node._yoast_wpseo_metadesc: Our industry knowledge and experience allow our test teams to quickly validate your most critical workflows and ensure key features work seamlessly.

node.title: Digital Quality Expertise for Every Industry and…
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

Industry Expertise

Tap into our vast, and deeply knowledgeable and independent global experts, across a wide range of vertical industries and customer solutions.

Design for What Really Matters to Your Customers

Dedicated experts to ensure you are testing right the first time, every time.

Applause has deep domain knowledge and expertise in the industries you care about – including retail, media and entertainment, financial services, travel and hospitality, healthcare, and IoT, among others. We also have extensive experience in the specific customer use cases that are critical to getting testing right the first time, every time.

For example, within three key segments of IoT – smart home, connected car and wearables – we ensure exceptional performance of use cases such as smart home device provisioning, education and onboarding of in-car infotainment systems, and the accuracy of health data collected by wearables.

We engage specialized teams based on industry, use case and testing needs, to ensure the fastest start possible and greatest return on your investment. These skilled teams can also be specially trained on your systems, processes and technology to ensure alignment across all your testing activities. Through our enterprise-class testing platform, these independent digital expert teams are assembled via an AI/ML-driven tester engagement process so you will always have the right team for your specific business requirements.

Build better, faster with industry experts

Applause has more than a decade’s worth of domain expertise across the most essential industries to enable you to release faster, with confidence.

Retail
BOPIS, curbside pickup, contactless payments
Retail
Media & Entertainment
Streaming quality, subscription processes, localized content
Media & Entertainment
Financial Services
Digital wallet validation, account opening and onboarding, online banking
Finance & Insurance
Travel & Hospitality
Customer journey validation from booking to check out, loyalty programs
Travel & Hospitality
Healthcare
Telehealth, chatbots, patient portals
Healthcare

See How Customers in Your Industry Are Leveraging Applause Today

Applause is the world leader in testing and digital quality. We’ve been working with companies like yours for over a decade – and we bring that expertise, experience and category leadership with us on every testing project. View our customer stories to see how we’ve helped brands in your industry – and how we can help you – deliver the quality digital experiences your customers will love.

Explore Customer Stories
"Our customers expect the best when they interact with us, whether that's in person, on our website or a mobile app. Applause gives us both the speed and flexibility we need to deliver quality digital properties and great experiences to our customers. With Applause, we are confident our customers will love the digital experiences we release"
Jeff Pierce, Director of Digital Product Management @ Peet's Coffee

Don’t see your vertical or use case? Contact us to learn how we’ve solved your industry’s problems.

We can help you deliver quality digital experiences to your customers, regardless of use case. We’ve worked with thousands of brands across the globe and in every vertical. Simply fill out the form below to better understand how we can help you.

[/et_pb_code] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]
node._yoast_wpseo_title: Digital Quality Expertise for Every Industry and…
node._yoast_wpseo_metadesc: Applause curates custom digital quality teams based on any industry, use case and testing need, to ensure every digital interaction works as intended.

Job Openings

Whether you’re into making deals, pushing pixels or building great product - we'd love to hear from you. Our current listing of open positions across all our offices can be found below.

Explore Our Openings

What Makes Us Unique?

Our customers, our employees, our unmatched leadership. But that’s not all. Fun, bright people; accessible executives; a flexible work environment; massive opportunity to grow and much more than we can fit in this small space.

Explore Our Culture
[/et_pb_code] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]

Get The Download

Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest best practices, news, and product updates from Applause.

Learn More About Applause

Headquartered in Framingham, Massachusetts—Applause is comprised of employees located throughout the world. Our six core offices are located in the United States, England, Germany, Israel, Poland and India.

Click the button below to get contact information for each of our offices, see our list of job openings and to learn a little more about the team and life at Applause. Digital experiences matter.

[/et_pb_code] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]

node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]
Leadership Team

Leading With Our Customers In Mind

Applause’s approach to leadership is one of reinforcing our core values and partnering with customers to help drive their business forward. That’s why we continue to lead the pack.

Meet Our Executive Team

➔
Chris Malone
Chief Executive Officer & Board Member
Chris Malone
Chief Executive Officer & Board Member

Chris Malone is the Chief Executive Officer and a board member at Applause. Chris joined Applause in 2013 and served as both chief financial officer and president, prior to his appointment as CEO. Chris has been instrumental in Applause’s growth and international expansion.

Prior to Applause, Chris worked at NTT Data, a top five global IT service provider, as the CFO of the North American business, responsible for financial oversight and operations of a billion-dollar operating unit. Chris took on that role after successfully exiting Keane to NTT Data in 2010. Prior to NTT Data, Chris held a number of leadership roles in finance, sales & operations. Chris began his career at KPMG and is a Certified Public Accountant.

Chris received his bachelor’s degree and MBA from Babson College in 2000. Chris serves as the Chair on the Babson College Advisory Board.

➔
Bradley Batchelder
Chief People Officer
Bradley Batchelder
Chief People Officer

As Chief People Officer at Applause, Bradley is passionate about building inclusive cultures, embracing innovation and creating memorable employee experiences. He has helped Applause earn its reputation as a high-growth company by cultivating a diverse culture. As a result, Applause is consistently recognized as a top place to work both locally and globally by organizations like Inc. Magazine, Boston Business Journal and the Boston Globe.

Along with building a culture of collaboration, Bradley makes supporting Applause’s surrounding community a priority. Applause’s volunteer and fundraising efforts have been recognized by the United Way with awards including the Live United Award and the Good Neighbor Award.

Prior to joining Applause, Bradley held roles in recruiting and talent acquisition at Monster and Enterprise Search.

➔
Tom Bonos
Chief Revenue Officer & Chief Operations Officer
Tom Bonos
Chief Revenue Officer & Chief Operations Officer

Tom Bonos is the Chief Revenue Officer and Chief Operations Officer at Applause. Tom drives the vision and execution of the global sales strategy and leads the company’s revenue generation and customer operations teams. Under his leadership, Applause has expanded its global footprint and achieved exponential growth, while ensuring our customers realize the value of Applause at each stage of their lifecycle.

Tom came to Applause with 15+ years of sales leadership. Most recently, he served as the executive vice president of sales for ServiceSource. Prior to ServiceSource, Tom was a group vice president at Oracle. Tom has also held leadership roles at SAP America and Benchmarking Partners/Surgency.

Tom graduated from Lehigh University with a degree in economics and geological sciences. Tom lives in Florida with his wife and children.

➔
Luke Damian
Chief Growth Officer
Luke Damian
Chief Growth Officer

Luke is the Chief Growth Officer at Applause. He owns the go-to-market strategy for the company, including its marketing and sales operations functions.

With a focused eye on accelerating growth, Luke brings 20+ years of operating experience to Applause from national leadership positions at Oracle and EMC. During his tenure with Oracle, he led sales, business development and customer success initiatives across multiple growth priorities including solution development, strategic customer acquisition and engagement, and customer retention programs. Earlier in his career, Luke held significant roles at EMC serving in various leadership positions across sales and business development.

Luke holds an MBA and a BS from Babson College. He also earned an Executive Certificate in Strategy and Innovation from MIT’s Sloan School of Management.

➔
Suzanne Gilfix
Vice President & General Counsel
Suzanne Gilfix
Vice President & General Counsel

Suzanne is the General Counsel and Vice President at Applause, responsible for the worldwide legal function for Applause and its subsidiaries. Suzanne oversees corporate governance and leads diversity; equity and inclusion; environment; social and governance initiatives.

Suzanne is a trusted advisor with 20+ years of highly diverse expertise in commercial law, compliance, data privacy, litigation, civil rights, IPO and more. She leads processes to minimize risk and grow customer acquisition and retention.

Suzanne has served on nonprofit boards: the Anti-Defamation League of New England; the Tyler Foundation in affiliation with Children’s Hospital; New England Corporate Counsel Association; and The Global Good Fund, mentoring young entrepreneurs.

Suzanne holds a Bachelor of Arts from Harvard College and JD from Boston University School of Law.

➔
Christopher Jolie
Chief Financial Officer
Christopher Jolie
Chief Financial Officer

Christopher Jolie is the Chief Financial Officer at Applause, managing the corporate areas of Finance & Accounting, IT and Business Applications & Systems. Chris is focused on delivering business oversight, strategic financial planning and process improvement across Applause.

Prior to joining Applause, Chris worked at NTT DATA Services, a top five global IT service provider. During his 17+ year tenure at NTT DATA, Chris held several high-profile roles including head of corporate financial planning & analysis, CFO of the Healthcare & Life-Science divisions and, most recently, CFO of the Manufacturing division. While at NTT Data Services, Chris played an active role in the NTT DATA acquisition of Keane, Inc., multiple M&A activities and financial oversight of $500M+ divisions. Prior to NTT DATA Services, Chris spent three years with Deutche Bank in the firm’s international equities group.

Chris received his Bachelor’s degree from Gordon College in 2000.

➔
Heather Levy Sigel
SVP of Corporate Strategy & Development
Heather Levy Sigel
SVP of Corporate Strategy & Development

Heather Levy Sigel is the SVP of Corporate Strategy & Development. She acts as a chief of staff to the CEO and has responsibility for corporate strategy, corporate development, and Applause's partnership & alliance channel.

Most recently, Heather worked at Deloitte Consulting. At Deloitte, she worked with Fortune 100 companies to develop and implement strategies to improve organizational performance and efficiency.

She graduated from Cornell University with a degree in industrial & labor relations and she received her MBA from the Tuck School at Dartmouth College.

➔
Rob Mason
Chief Technology Officer
Rob Mason
Chief Technology Officer

Rob Mason has more than 20 years of operational, management, and software development experience across various companies, languages, platforms and technologies. A meticulous builder and obsessive tester, Rob’s teams produce innovative, robust software.

Prior to Applause, Rob was founder and executive vice president of engineering at Nasuni, where he took the company from initial product concept to more than 10 petabytes of managed storage consisting of billions of files in a global file system. Prior to Nasuni, Rob oversaw all development and quality assurance as the VP of engineering at Archivas.

Rob holds over 30 patents including several in the area of test automation. He has a Bachelor of Science degree from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute and an MBA degree with honors from Rutgers University. Rob lives on a horse farm in Massachusetts with his wife.

➔
Leanne Orphanos
SVP of Customer Operations
Leanne Orphanos
SVP of Customer Operations

As Senior Vice President of Customer Operations, Leanne implements strategies that drive customer success, retention and operational excellence for North America. She also oversees our strategic practices and global community of testers.

Leanne brings over 25 years of experience to Applause from leadership positions at NTT Data and PricewaterhouseCoopers (PWC). At NTT Data, Leanne executed complex, global initiatives spanning business transformation, acquisition and integration efforts, global financial system and business intelligence implementations, as well as operational optimization. She also improved business processes and systems that drove more effective resource utilization, business controls and cost management metrics across five key delivery centers. Earlier in her career, Leanne was focused on sales and business development, client service delivery and business process and controls consulting at PWC.

Leanne received her bachelor's degree from Tufts University.

➔
Chris Sheehan
SVP & General Manager, Strategic Accounts
Chris Sheehan
SVP & General Manager, Strategic Accounts

As SVP and GM, Strategic Accounts, Chris enables the success of Applause’s strategic account business including strategy, sales and operations to ensure continued growth and customer success of Applause’s largest customers. Since joining Applause in 2015, Chris has held roles on multiple teams at Applause including software delivery, product strategy and customer success.

Chris has over 22 years of experience with high-growth companies as an operating executive, investor and board member. Prior to Applause, Chris was COO of venture-backed TrueLens, a SaaS data platform. Previous experience includes seven years as a general partner of an early-stage technology VC fund, and operating roles at enterprise software company BEA Systems and Stax, a global strategy consulting firm.

Chris holds a Bachelor of Commerce degree from the University of Queensland, Australia.

➔
Jan Wolter
Head of Product & Managing Director, Applause EU
Jan Wolter
Head of Product & Managing Director, Applause EU

As SVP of Product and General Manager at Applause EU, Jan leads our product organization and sets the strategic roadmap. Partnering with Engineering, his organization ensures we build solutions that address ongoing key customer business challenges. In addition, Jan leads European operations. As such, he ensures that Applause Europe meets its revenue and customer acquisition goals while maintaining the highest levels of quality and customer satisfaction.

Before joining Applause, Jan was CEO and co-founder of Testhub, which was acquired by Applause in May 2014. Jan has long supported companies from different sectors in implementing and scaling innovative software testing solutions for years before joining Applause.

Jan holds a Master of Science degree from London School of Economics and a Bachelor of Science degree from University of Mannheim, Germany.

➔
Julia Zacharias
SVP of EMEA Customer Operations & Accessibility Practice Lead
Julia Zacharias
SVP of EMEA Customer Operations & Accessibility Practice Lead

As SVP EMEA of Customer Operations, Julia oversees Solution Delivery, Testing Services, and Community Management in the EMEA region. In this role, she drives expansion, retention, operational excellence and continuous improvement in close alignment with Sales and Product. She also leads the European part of the global accessibility practice and helps clients create inclusive and legally compliant digital experiences for their end customers.

Julia has 15 years of experience leading large scale organizational transformations as a consultant at Kearney and project portfolio manager at Kion Group. She developed and led programs to drive operational excellence based on lean methods and enablement across all hierarchies, mainly for German 500 companies in the utilities, transportation and manufacturing sector. Earlier in her career, Julia worked as a public sector consultant focused on regional economic growth and industrial policy.

Julia holds a Master's Degree in Economics and Political Sciences from Freie Universität Berlin and has been a visiting student at Princeton University and Harvard University. She is a Certified Program Consultant for SAFe (Scaled Agile) and a Systemic Coach.

Meet Our Board of Directors

Michael Fosnaugh
Vista Equity Partners
Liza Landsman
Independent Director
Danielle Lee
Independent Director
Chris Malone
Applause CEO
Chad Martin
Vista Equity Partners
Jason Mills
Independent Director
Nick Prickel
Vista Equity Partners
Stephen Seelbach
Vista Equity Partners
Jeff Wilson
Vista Equity Partners
node._yoast_wpseo_metadesc: Meet the Applause leadership team that reinforces our values and commitment to outstanding digital quality for our global customers.

node.title: Life at Applause
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]
Life at Applause

We Live for Applause

Do you work hard and play hard? Do you want to be part of an incredible team and rub elbows with smart, authentic leaders? Do you live to solve the world’s toughest problems for the world’s coolest brands? If so, you are definitely going to like it here.

Join Our Team

Don’t just take our word for it

We Live and Breathe Our Values

Our values inform our choices — as individuals, as teammates and on behalf of our customers. Here’s how we deliver the best outcomes, day after day.

In It Together

Collaborate and support each other in achieving our shared goals.

Be Accountable

Take ownership for yourself, your teams, your customers and Applause.

Create Value for Customers

Deliver meaningful business impact and high-quality results for our customers.

Celebrate Authenticity

Bring your true self to work and respect each other’s differences.

Crush Your Goals

Strive for excellence and drive continuous improvement.

Hear from Applause employees on how our core values help shape culture.

Community
Customer Ops
Engineering
G&A
Marketing
Product
Sales

Cultivate Our Expert Community

Help us keep the Applause global community operating at its best for our customers. Use your vast organizational and proven people skills to nurture this one-of-a-kind crowdtesting force, currently approaching 2M strong. Support our community mantra — Learn, Earn, Connect — by onboarding, training and helping testers put cash in the bank. Recruit diverse testers who represent real-world users of our customers’ apps and digital experiences. Keep them on their toes by sharing relevant content, encouraging participation in forums, and growing their knowledge and skills.

Dazzle and Delight Our Customers

Are you great with people and get your energy from helping others achieve their goals? As part of the Customer Ops group, which includes Testing Services and Account Management, you’ll immerse yourself in all things customer-related, becoming an extension of their teams by serving as a strategic partner to help them exceed expectations. Define and execute testing strategies. Be a client rockstar as you guide them to the best Applause solutions that will bring music to their ears and success to their business.

Only the Best Code Slingers Need Apply

As a software engineer at Applause, you’ll be happily immersed in code and nestled in a group that includes Information Security, our QA teams and the Applause Labs R&D pod. Work hard to drive innovation into our enterprise-grade platform. Apply the same elbow grease to ensure our millions of global testers can perform their work flawlessly. Are you agile? Are you driven to release fast? Do you live to solve the hardest problems and then humble-brag about it? Hit the button below.

Make the Trains Run On Time

Want to help Applause run smoothly? Our administrative foundation functions – IT, Finance, People Operations and Legal – are the lifeblood of our business. Got a head for numbers? Speak fluent laptop? Pass the Bar on your first try? Find, nurture and engage top-notch talent? We need you. Help us keep Applause out in front as the leader in testing and digital quality by making sure we are a well-oiled machine.

Let Your Creative Juices Flow

Join our internal marketing agency and flex your creative muscle by building compelling programs that strengthen the Applause brand and grow our business. Teach the world about our platform, solutions and community. Deliver digital campaigns that have prospects lining up at the door. Build slick brand assets that help Applause put its best foot forward. Master the marketing funnel to help overachieve revenue goals. Keep our internal clients smiling. Inspired? Impress us with your elegant CV.

Be a Product of Your Own Success

Do you love to solve problems? Do you dream about creating the next big thing and bringing it to market? Our Product group needs another great mind like yours. We’re the center of the wheel whose spokes include Engineering, Sales, Customer Operations and Marketing. So, we’re sort of important. Help us make our multi-tenant enterprise platform even stronger. Envision the future of testing and digital quality, then help us build it. Be a talking head to industry analysts and the media. And enjoy spirited conversations with your Engineering brethren.

Help Us Hit The Number

Do you love to sell? Crave tough challenges with big rewards? Sales roles at Applause are as diverse as they are critical to our mission. From hunting new accounts to farming existing relationships, from sales enablement to operations, from solution consulting to account management, the opportunities are endless. Give us your best sales pitch - apply now!

Work Where You’re Best

Life’s hard enough – where you work shouldn’t be. Whether you need in-person collaboration or solitude to focus, our global offices and flexible remote options will help you find your work groove.

We Meet Your Life Needs

From in-office snacks to outstanding recognition, from work/life balance to physical fitness, from healthcare to wealthcare, our benefits and perks have you covered.

Work/Life Balance

Applause offers in-office, hybrid and remote work opportunities across all of our global locations. For those in office, we have a casual environment with plenty of drinks and snacks. We are also proud to extend generous paid time off and paid parental leave to every Applause employee.

Employee Recognition

Applause celebrates every work anniversary with a gift and a shout-out on social media. We also celebrate wins big and small with monthly, quarterly, annual and on-the-spot awards – cash, gift cards, points to spend in the company store and more.

Learning & Development

Applause employees have access to a major learning platform catalog. We encourage professional development through Applause-curated curriculum and personal development through any courses that interest you. We also conduct online diversity training for every employee as part of our DEI initiatives.

Applause Fun

Through our company stores, employees may receive Applause-branded swag for new hire gifts, anniversaries and recognition awards. We also sponsor company events locally and globally, in person and virtually.

Giving Back

Applause takes great pride in giving back to the community. We support charitable organizations like dream.org, GLAAD and United Way through financial donations and volunteer work. Got something specific you’re passionate about? Let us know.

Learn more about us on Instagram

Follow us @applausenation

We Humbly Accept

Our most important asset is our people. We are honored that Applause Nation believes in us and tells the world year after year. We strive to earn the respect of our team and live up to these awards in everything we do.
node._yoast_wpseo_metadesc: Learn about our values, departments, work/life balance and what it’s like to work and play hard while enabling the best digital experiences for our clients.

shift-left is helpingnn

nLarge companies shifting left report multiple benefits in their SDLC. The top three benefits, according to our survey, were reducing the number of bugs released to end users, saving costs on late-stage bug fixes and reducing the amount of hot-fixes.n

nFor large companies releasing frequently who have shifted left, how has shifting left helped your dev/QA/product efforts?
