node.title: Functional Testing by Experts in Your Industry
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

Manual Functional Testing

Functionality powered by real-world customer insights.

Build for humans. Test with humans.

Deliver exceptional experiences — every time, on any device, under real conditions.

Product and engineering leaders have a vision for how a product should work. But when it comes to whether and how the product actually works in the real world, they often don’t know. Relying solely on traditional, in-house testing methods is a recipe for letting defects slip into production while not being able to scale and speed up your development operations.

The only way to continuously ensure flawless experiences for your customers is to test in the real world, with real users, on real devices. Applause leverages the largest, most diverse community of skilled testers to create custom teams that augment your internal QA efforts. Testers interact with your software under real-world conditions across the devices and locations that are relevant to you, and identify high-impact bugs before they reach your customers.

Our approach combines exploratory testing, to discover issues stemming from unexpected usage patterns and real-world conditions, with structured testing, to ensure core features work as intended. The size and diversity of our independent uTest community enables you to test in any country, in any language and on any region-specific device to ensure all features are localized.

Your customers are out in the world — not in a lab

Find critical issues with real-world testing before your customers do

Get ahead of the unexpected
Exploratory testing validates unexpected customer paths
Gain unparalleled coverage
Global testing teams supplement internal capabilities for 200% more testing capacity
Go to market faster
On-demand testing with integrated results speed release velocity by 150%

Real-Time, High-Impact Results

Improve quality and increase release velocity

With Manual Functional Testing, you’ll receive a dedicated team that manages all aspects of testing to match your objectives and advise on testing best practices. We ramp up quickly without disrupting your team or existing processes. Applause’s results are available in real time to match the pace of your development cycle, and results are filtered to ensure you receive unique and valuable issues. Our process enables your team to address issues quickly and efficiently, reduce the number of bugs released into production and improve the overall quality of your applications.

You can also supplement Manual Functional Testing with additional solutions to gain additional insights and speed up your testing capabilities:

  • Integrated Functional Testing: Combine manual and automated testing processes into a cohesive solution to ensure maximum test coverage and speed, with a single dashboard to view all results.

  • Applause In-Sprint Testing: For fast-moving development teams, validate the functionality of individual features with a streamlined process built into your bug tracking system that ensures rapid turnaround as part of a shift-left approach.

  • Bring Your Own Testers: Leverage your internal teams — such as employees, friends and families — for testing while Applause’s team manages the set-up, execution and delivery of results alongside findings from the Applause community.

Uber Case Study

Learn how Uber ensures a great experience for every customer by testing beyond “the happy path” in the real world across hundreds of cities across the globe.
Watch Now

Are Traditional Testing Approaches Letting You Down?

Let us show you how we can extend your team’s capabilities and improve the quality of your digital experiences. Simply fill out the form, and join thousands of Applause customers who’ve been able to:

  • Increase Release Velocity: Kick off testing at any time and see results in hours.

  • Increase Productivity: Access qualified testing teams to scale as needed.

  • Improve Quality: Uncover critical issues before they reach travelers.

[/et_pb_code] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]
node._yoast_wpseo_title: Functional Testing by Experts in Your Industry
node._yoast_wpseo_metadesc: Functional testing by Applause is the best way to ensure your software works every time for every customer regardless of location, device, and use case.

node.title: Testing with the Global Leader in QA
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

Build Better, Faster

Release with speed, scale and confidence.

Actionable, Holistic Insights Into Your Quality, All in One Place

Finally, you have more capacity for innovation.

You are the innovator of what’s possible at your company. But engineering teams always have too much to do and not enough people. Backlogs build up, and you simply can’t continuously and efficiently achieve the highest level of innovation and quality.

Applause’s community-based approach coupled with our enterprise-class testing platform provides an unmatched holistic view into the quality of your digital assets, and expands your reach and capacity without barriers or additional overhead. With a flexible and scalable model that meets your needs, you can build products quickly and have the confidence to commit to more innovative projects. Finally, becoming a quality engineering powerhouse is within your reach.

Achieve a Higher Level of Engineering Quality

Applause provides the only enterprise-grade, interoperable testing platform available today, helping you to release on time, each time.

Innovate Like Never Before
30%-50% fewer critical bug fixes needed, reducing your backlog of bugs and enabling you to look ahead.
Amplify your Capacity
200%+ more testing capacity, exponentially increasing your resources and ability to take on more meaningful projects.
Commit with Confidence
+150% increase in release velocity, enabling you to hit deadlines easily.

Broader Test Coverage for Fewer Escaped Defects

Continuously release higher-quality software.

With engineering budgets remaining flat or decreasing, but the amount of work constantly increasing, teams need more resources to get the work done while keeping costs low. Applause scales your test coverage with continuous manual and automated test execution while minimizing management overhead and costs.

Applause gives you access to specialized teams of hard-to-find talent anywhere in the world to increase device and location coverage, leading to fewer defects in production and less time spent on hot fixes. With a follow-the-sun model, you can source skilled testers instantly to free up your development team’s time, allowing them to focus on more strategic initiatives and build cool, innovative products.

Dow Jones Case Study

Discover how Dow Jones partners with Applause to uncover critical bugs, increase release velocity and provide an improved customer experience.
Watch Now

Improve the Speed and Quality of Your Releases

Let us show you how we can accelerate your development velocity while ensuring high-quality issues. Fill out the form below to discover how you can:

  • Increase Release Velocity: Kick off testing at any time and see actionable results in hours.
  • Avoid Unexpected Costs: Keep overhead and costs low while improving quality.
  • Improve Productivity: Developers are kept focused on application code.
[/et_pb_code] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]
node._yoast_wpseo_title: Testing with the Global Leader in QA
node._yoast_wpseo_metadesc: Applause lets you test across the world, on any device, to assure quality at release. We enable engineers to increase velocity, without losing quality.

node.title: Digital Quality Testing for Finance and…
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

Trusted Banking for Everyone, Everywhere

Confidently provide exceptional banking for today’s connected world.

Excel in the New Age of Banking

Real-world insights for full-service, frictionless and trusted online banking

You work at a forward-thinking financial institution, and digital-first experiences are now table stakes. But as customers rely more on banking websites and mobile apps to provide full-service and personalized banking, their digital experiences are often lacking. That’s impacting their ability to build trust and establish lifetime customer relationships. With limited QA resources, how can you confidently provide exceptional financial experiences around the globe that earn trust and loyalty?

Applause helps banks and insurance companies ensure quality digital experiences at speed and scale, to meet customers’ digital finance needs. Applause’s community-based approach coupled with our enterprise-class testing platform validates that key features — such as digital onboarding, money transfers and claim processing — function properly, while providing actionable insights to improve your user experience.

Deliver Banking Your Customers Will Love

Financial Services companies require top-notch digital experiences for today’s consumers. Wroking with Applause, you have the holistic testing platform you need to uncover the critical issues your customers care about, enabling you to:

Earn Customer Loyalty with Real-World Quality
Use real-world insights to deliver seamless digital experiences
Ensure Customers can Bank Anywhere
Test in local markets across the globe
Release Faster than Ever Before
Roll out new features quickly by removing the QA bottleneck

The Only Way to Ensure Digital Banking Works for Real Customers

Test in the real world to find critical bugs fast and early

Financial institutions and insurance companies must ensure excellent experiences for customers. To do this, you need to go beyond the lab and test in the real world, with real users, on real devices.

Applause provides custom and diverse teams of skilled, independent testers that augment your internal QA efforts. Tailored to your specific needs, testers interact with your software under real-world conditions across the devices and locations that are relevant to you, and identify high-impact bugs before they reach your customers.

Our approach combines exploratory testing, to discover issues stemming from unexpected usage patterns and real-world conditions, with structured testing, to validate core features work as intended. The size and diversity of our community empowers you to test in any country, in any language and on any region-specific device to ensure all features are localized.

Western Union Case Study

Discover how Western Union digitized its global payments network with Applause’s help.
Watch Now

Are Traditional Testing Approaches Letting Your Customers Down?

Let us show you how we can extend your team’s capabilities and improve the quality of your digital experiences for your customers. Simply fill out the form, and join thousands of Applause customers who’ve been able to:

  • Increase Release Velocity: Kick off testing at any time and see results in hours.
  • Increase Productivity: Access qualified testing teams to scale as needed.
  • Improve Quality: Uncover critical issues before they reach your customer.
[/et_pb_code] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]

node.title: How We Help QA Teams
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

Digital Quality, On Time Every Time

Manage More Testing with Ease and Excellence.

Extend Your QA Efforts With a Flexible Team

Scale testing resources on your schedule.

Quality is your obsession. But your team is constantly stretched thin, deadlines are tight and there are always too many critical customer flows to test. How are you supposed to ensure customers don’t encounter impactful bugs when you can’t test everything you’re supposed to on time?

Now you’ve got a QA partner. Applause’s community-based approach, coupled with our enterprise-class testing platform, gives you access to real-world insights and increased testing capacity. With our flexible and scalable model, your teams will have the support they need to ensure everything that needs to be tested, gets tested. Finally, you can meet deadlines and detect critical bugs before customers do — achieving digital quality with ease.

Your QA Team is Getting Reinforcements

Applause is the only holistic testing platform that identifies issues before customers do.

Find Show-Stopper Bugs
30%-50% fewer critical bug fixes needed by identifying bugs before they reach your customers.
Supplement Your Teams
200%+ more testing capacity that increases your capabilities across devices, OSes, geographies and more.
Defeat Crazy Deadlines
On-demand testing with immediate results means your teams don’t need to work 24/7.

Proven Testers for Proven Results

Leverage specialized teams of qualified professionals.

Applause engages, assembles and manages custom teams of skilled QA professionals that augment your teams and remain focused on your product throughout your SDLC. Proven testers serve as your consistent team to maintain ongoing knowledge of your products and boost the speed and scalability of your efforts. With testers available in real time, you can scale up or down to match shifting testing volume and business priorities.

Testing in real-world settings enables more comprehensive device and location coverage, leading to more flexibility and fewer bugs found in production. Applause’s fully managed service integrates seamlessly within your existing Agile or CI/CD environment, augmenting your internal team’s ability to keep up with the pace of development.

Dignity Health Case Study

See how Applause integrates into the Dignity Health team and helps the healthcare company speed release velocity and improve test coverage.
Watch Now

Take Back Your Weekends and Support Your Existing Testing Team

Let us show you how we can extend your team’s capabilities with a flexible and scalable approach to QA. Fill out the form below to discover how you can:

  • Improve Team Satisfaction: Let Applause handle the mundane tasks as your team focuses on more strategic initiatives.
  • Increase Productivity: Access qualified testing teams to scale as needed.
  • Release Faster: Kick off testing at any time and see results in hours.
[/et_pb_code] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]
node._yoast_wpseo_metadesc: Applause supports QA with custom, flexible teams of testers. Leverage Applause to increase QA speed, coverage and productivity.

node.title: Integrated Functional Testing for a Holistic…
node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

Integrated Functional Testing

Master digital excellence with one cohesive solution that combines both automated and manual functional testing.

Maximize coverage and speed with a cohesive testing solution

Accelerate Development Velocity While Improving Quality.

To test your complete digital experience at speed and scale, it is essential to leverage both manual and automated testing. However, when manual and automated testing are not approached as a coordinated solution, it can result in redundancy and a failure to maximize test coverage. With Applause Integrated Functional Testing, your manual and automated testing are combined into one cohesive solution to accelerate development velocity and maximize digital quality.

Our approach allows you to capture a true real-world perspective from manual testing by leveraging our global community, while capitalizing on the speed and reliability of test automation. You’ll have a dedicated team of experts that will help design your test strategy to maximize results. As part of our integrated approach, automation failures are immediately validated by our community and we continually assess which manual tests should be transitioned to automation.

Functional testing that is greater than the sum of its parts.

Applause is the only testing partner in the market that integrates manual and automation as one enterprise-grade solution.

Cut through silos
Remove inefficiencies and reduce wasted time, by testing both manual and automated in tandem.
Gain Insight from Real Users
Supplement test automation with manual testing conducted by real people on real devices.
View Quality Holistically
Results aggregated into a single dashboard to accelerate responsiveness and strategy adaptation.

Attain a Holistic View of Quality

Integrated test results save time, money and improve strategies.

When manual and automated approaches are siloed, it can lead to fragmented results and added time to work between systems. With Applause Integrated Functional Testing, your manual and automated results and reporting are combined into a single dashboard so you have one trusted view of quality.

This helps streamline your workflows, and provides significant cost and efficiency savings by eliminating the need for multiple systems. It also provides greater visibility into your results, giving you an understanding of the overall health of a specific product, feature or functionality at any point in time.

Is Your Existing Testing Approach Meeting Your Speed and Quality Goals?

Let’s discuss how you can integrate manual and automated testing to maximize coverage and speed. Simply fill out the form below, and join thousands of Applause customers who’ve been able to:

  • Accelerate Development Velocity: Increase testing speed to get to market faster.
  • Improve Digital Quality: Uncover issues before they reach your customers.
  • Streamline Workflows: Eliminate the burdens of working between separate systems to view results.
[/et_pb_code] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]

Release flawless and secure omnichannel banking experience with real-world user testing and feedback

Welcome! We've created a place just for you.

Be prepared for every edge case by testing with your ideal customer profile – even your real account holders. No matter the platform, payment instrument or location, our community of vetted digital experts will validate your end-to-end banking experience, ensuring you catch critical bugs before each release.

Take a look around to learn how you can speed up your SDLC and capture the voice of your customer with real-world testing, and how we’ve helped financial services brands just like yours.

Resources just for you

Analyst Report: Driving ROI in Banking

Realize a 200% increase in your test team's capacity with Applause.

Quick Guide: How Applause Helps Financial Services

Finance leaders around the globe partner with Applause to deliver quality digital banking services.

Webinar: The Power of Customer Listening with Citi

eBook: 5 Ways to Reduce Friction in Omnichannel Banking

Quick Guide: Bringing Biometric Security to Banking

Webinar: How to Deliver High-Quality and Secure Digital Payments

Customer Case Studies

Read the Story >>
Watch Now >>
Watch Now >>

Want to talk? So do we!

Get in touch with us to explore how you can accelerate software development and deliver the highest-quality digital experiences to your customers.

[/et_pb_code] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]

node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

Increase Your Release Velocity with Around-The-Clock Testing

Welcome! We’ve created a place just for you.

With Applause, you can improve the quality of your releases without testing slowing you down. While you’re developing, our community of vetted QA experts will test your apps pre or post-production and under real-world conditions, allowing you to iterate faster and uncover issues before your customers do.

Take a look around to learn how you can release higher-quality software – faster – with real-world testing, and how we’ve helped engineering professionals at brands just like yours.

Resources just for your team.

Infographic: Take Back Your Weekend

Leave the office on Friday and arrive back on Monday with issues waiting for your review.

node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

Don’t Gamble on Quality. Test with Applause.

Welcome! We've created a place just for you.

You can solve for every edge case by testing with your ideal customer profile. No matter the platform or payment instrument, our community of vetted digital experts will validate and provide insights on your end-to-end experiences, ensuring you capture the voice of the customer in every release.

Take a look around to learn how you can make your customer experiences even better with real-world testing, and how we’ve helped gambling, gaming and betting brands.

Resources just for you

eBook: 3 Keys To Growing Your Online Sportsbook And Casino Business

There's a lot of moving parts to get right for online gambling operators, and it's critical to test with real users.

Webinar: Place Your Bets: The Trends Set To Transform Online Gambling

Register Now: On Nov 16th at 5:30 PM CET David Pilgrim (Sky Betting & Gaming) and Philippe Joos (Napoleon Sports & Casino) come together to discuss the future of online gambling.

Blog: How to Create a Stellar Digital Customer Experience for Online Gambling

Neville Agius (PO at Play'n GO) will talk on December 15th at 5:30 PM CET about "The Scrum Product Owner Role in Different Industries". Register Here!

Case Study: Greentube

eBook: The Essential Guide to Crowdtesting

Blog: 3 Customer Experience Testing Must-Dos To Serve All Customers

Whitepaper: Introducing The Applause Quality Score™

Webinar: How To Go Codeless For Automated Mobile App Testing

The Rise of Esports Betting: 5 Opportunities for Bookmakers

Are Traditional Testing Approaches Letting Your Users Down?

Let us show you how we can extend your team’s capabilities and improve the quality of your digital experiences for your players!

Drive customer loyalty and ensure flawless and secure omnichannel experiences with real-world user feedback

Welcome! We've created a place just for you.

You can solve for every edge case by testing with your ideal customer profile. No matter the platform or payment instrument, our community of vetted digital experts will validate and provide insights on your end-to-end experiences, ensuring you capture the voice of the customer in every release.

Take a look around to learn how you can make your customer experiences even better with real-world testing, and how we’ve helped financial services brands.

Ensure Best-in-Class Viewing Experiences by Testing in Any Market, on Any Device

Welcome! We've created a place just for you.

The best chance to land and retain viewers is to test under the real-world conditions they face, finding issues before release. No matter the platform, our global community of vetted digital experts will validate and provide insights on your digital experiences, ensuring they are seamless and relevant every time.

Take a look around to learn how you can make the viewing experience even better with on-demand testing, and how we’ve helped brands just like yours.

node.content:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" da_is_popup="off" da_exit_intent="off" da_has_close="on" da_alt_close="off" da_dark_close="off" da_not_modal="on" da_is_singular="off" da_with_loader="off" da_has_shadow="on" da_disable_devices="off|off|off"] [et_pb_row _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_column _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" type="4_4" theme_builder_area="post_content"] [et_pb_code _builder_version="{$version}" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_margin="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"]

Deliver digital experiences that work flawlessly - every time, on any device, under all conditions.

Welcome! We've created a place just for you.

You can solve for every edge case by testing with your ideal customer profile. No matter the platform or payment instrument, our community of vetted digital experts will validate and provide insights on your end-to-end experiences, ensuring you capture the voice of the customer in every release.

Take a look around to learn how you can make your customer experiences even better with real-world testing, and how we’ve helped media, entertainment and telecommunication brands.

Resources just for you

Analyst Report: Driving ROI in Media

Realize a 200% increase in your test team's capacity with Applause.

Testing BBC Voice Assistant Beeb

Webinar: Testing for real-world conditions to create a conversational interface

A New Roaming Testing Approach for Mobile Network Operators

Progress and More Progress: How 5G Revolutionizes Various Industires

Overview: How We Help Improve Streaming Quality

How BT Ensures Digital Quality

How The Best Digital Media Brands Captivate Audiences

Swisscom

How to Address The 3 Biggest Threats Facing Digital Media Brands

eBook: Working Smarter, Not Harder, Towards Digital Quality

Customer Case Studies

Read the Story >>
Watch the Video >>
Watch the Video >>

Are Traditional Testing Approaches Letting Your Users Down?

Let us show you how we can extend your team’s capabilities and improve the quality of your digital experiences for your viewers.

Improve Every Customer's Experience by Testing All Touchpoints of Their Journey

Welcome! We’ve created a place just for you.

You can solve for every edge case by testing with your ideal customer profile. No matter the channel, our community of vetted digital experts will validate and provide actionable insights on your products end-to-end, ensuring you capture the voice of the customer in every release.

Take a look around to learn how you can make your customer experiences even better with real-world testing, and how we’ve helped product professionals at brands just like yours.

Resources just for your team.

Infographic: Deliver Quality at Every Touchpoint

Are you providing the in-store experiences that customers demand? Find out.

Attain Full Code Coverage with Real-World Testing

Welcome! We’ve created a place just for you.

With Applause, you can expand your coverage of edge cases and improve the quality of releases while still meeting your deadlines. Scaling up and down as needed, our global community of vetted QA experts will help uncover issues by testing under the conditions that matter most to your team.

Take a look around to learn how you can achieve complete code coverage with real-world testing, and how we’ve helped QA professionals at brands just like yours.

Resources just for your QA team.

Infographic: Take Back Your Weekend

Leave the office on Friday and arrive back on Monday with issues waiting for your review.

Increase Your Release Velocity with Around-The-Clock Testing

Welcome! We’ve created a place just for you.

With Applause, you can improve the quality of your releases without testing slowing you down. While you’re developing, our community of vetted QA experts will test your apps pre or post-production and under real-world conditions, allowing you to iterate faster and uncover issues before your customers do.

Take a look around to learn how you can release higher-quality software – faster – with real-world testing, and how we’ve helped engineering professionals at brands just like yours.

Resources just for your team.

node._yoast_wpseo_title: The Essential Guide To Agile Testing
node._yoast_wpseo_metadesc: The nature of agile often forces a choice between adding functionality or testing for quality. The Essential Guide to Agile Testing shows you how do have both.
